name: pglite-deno-tests
description: Tests for pglite running in Deno. The `test` script below is designed to trick Deno into 'Node Compatibility' mode for the tests.

scripts.test: rm -rf ./pgdata-test && rm -rf ./node_modules && mkdir -p ./node_modules/@electric-sql/ && ln -s ../../../../../ ./node_modules/@electric-sql/pglite && deno test --allow-read --allow-write --allow-env --allow-sys --node-modules-dir ./*.test.deno.js
